content: Hey folks. Have $100 BTC, looking for 1:1 Zelle. Will only trade with a reputable member.I will go first and have the crypto, but it has been a while so I'll sign a quick message with an address I posted in 2017.Code:-----BEGIN BITCOIN SIGNED MESSAGE-----Hi. Cxin back on BitcoinTalk. comments.author: Cxinbolen
comments.body: Quote from: albert0bsd on October 13, 2023, 01:12:47 PMSignature verified and quoted:-snip-Hi. I am interested in this exchange, let me know if you want to trade with me.I am going to send back the PP payment after one confirmationRegards!Thanks for verifying.Sorry mate, but looking for someone with trade history.

comments.author: albert0bsd
comments.body: I undertand you perfectly, one question how one person can develop trade history if nobody trade with him?I am about to trade with some other user this next monday and that is weekly trade agreement, check next topic that i create.    I want to buy bitcoin periodically.I am not going to burn my account for 100$ USD, i am actually in a campaign signature and my reputation worth more than 100USD.But anyway if you desition is final, then there is nothign to do.Good luck with your trade

comments.author: Cxinbolen
comments.body: Quote from: albert0bsd on October 13, 2023, 03:29:19 PMI undertand you perfectly, one question how one person can develop trade history if nobody trade with him?I see this often but your first trade does not need to be trading reversible fiat for bitcoin. Buy goods, trade crypto for crypto with an MM, bid on auctions, those are all activities that no one will care about your trade history to trade with you.Swapped to Zelle. Still looking for this, not in a rush.
